attributes.action: Raise the tax rate on all meat being imported into the UK by 25%
attributes.additional_details:
For more information on why this bill is necessary, try visiting these two pages:

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/men/thinking-man/11761701/We-all-need-to-stop-eating-meat-now-and-this-is-why.html

https://www.vegsoc.org/goveggie
attributes.background: In order to discourage people from buying ethically wrong, unhealthy and environmentally damaging meat, this petition calls for the current tax rate on meat products being imported into the United Kingdom to be increased by 25%.
